summary: After World War I, a war hero returns to Berlin to find that there's no place for him--he has no skills other than what he learned in the army, and can only find menial, low-paying jobs. He decides to become a gigolo to lonely rich women.
cast: David Bowie|Sydne Rome|Kim Novak|David Hemmings|Maria Schell|Curd Jürgens|Erika Pluhar|Hilde Weissner|Werner Pochath|Marlene Dietrich|Rudolf Schündler|Evelyn Künneke|Friedhelm Lehmann|Karin Hardt|Rainer Hunold|Christiane Maybach|Martin Hirthe|Reinhard Kolldehoff|Gudrun Genest|Bela Ernyey|Ulrich Bödecker|Ursula Heyer|Lotti Huber|Y Sa Lo|Günter Meisner|Peter Schlesinger|Wieland Speck
keywords: gigolo|last film role for actress|title based on song|post world war one|wedding
title: Gigolo
